MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2 - B8: Evaluation - Physical / Neurological Exam Findings

age.Description: Age of the participant at visit

NORMAL.Description: Exam findings normal - Are all findings unremarkable (normal or normal for age)?

FOCLDEF.Description: Focal deficits - Are focal deficits present indicative of central nervous system disorder?

GAITDIS.Description: Gait disorder - Is gait disorder present indicative of central nervous system disorder?

EYEMOVE.Description: Eye movement abnormalities - Are there eye movement abnormalities present indicative of central nervous system disorder?
